entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Provide a public Nagivation API #71627
  • IntelliSense feature request: Report references, which cannot be resolved (anymore) #71466
  • Implement code mapper #69967
    17.9
  • Symbol - Static is not bold #71470
  • Show interface documentation #71469
  • analyzer to detect duplicated code that can be simplified #71436
  • Generate Method isn't offered if a non-applicable extension method exists #71433
    Backlog
  • #endregion name should match #region name, display current region #71344
  • Opposite of Use Inferred Member Name (IDE0037) #39789
    Backlog
  • LSIF generator can sometimes write non-LSIF to stdout #69137
    17.8 P4
  • Improve Introduce Variable support in Conditional Access Expressions #3110
    18.0
  • All Quick Actions should have assignable shortcuts #67413
    18.0
  • Extract Method "continue anyway" does not work #67488
    18.0
  • [LSP pull diagnostics] Ordering semantics for open document/project processing for background analysis #67687
    Backlog
  • Public LSP Handler API that provides Roslyn context #67363
    Backlog
  • Allow user to finish typing before displaying new inline diagnostic messages from Background Analysis #71314
  • Opening document causes source generators to re-run #71251
  • Experimental Feature "Enable all features in opened files from source generators" yields duplicated output errors #71243
  • Features currently not available - the issue still exists in Version 17.7.6 of Visual Studio Professional 2022 #71076
  • [Bug]: No IntelliSense pop-ups within interpolation expressions #70918
    Backlog
  • Integration test deadlock caused by improper use of JTF in ExtensionManagerService #70966
  • OutputWIndowLogger does now follow WindowLogging guidelines #66397
  • System.InvalidOperationException #65949
    17.10
  • IDE0027: false positive with pragmas #68913
    17.9
  • Exception thrown on solution load in VSMac #65573
    Backlog
  • Roslyn LSIF generator should support optional sharding mode #70438
  • BC40003 code fix should offer both 'Overloads' and 'Shadows' #70434
  • VB.Net "Convert to Full Property" - "New" key word will not move to field #67800
    17.9
  • C# refactoring "Move type to new file" generates file violating stylecop rule SA1505 #66639
    17.9
  • Visual Basic "Move Type to..." refactoring for nested types duplicates entire parent type #66018
    17.9
  • Code folding in Razor markup does not fold #region #67874
  • "Remove and sort usings" removed newline before first using #70153
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio keeps losing reference to App_Code.dll while coding. #70155
    Backlog
  • C#: IntelliSense unimported suggestion items does not automatically add global namespace to using statement it adds #70218
    Backlog
  • Inline hints should cache and reuse measurement data #70315
    17.9
  • Add integration tests for Fix All operations with preview #27806
    Backlog
  • We should have good documentation links for installing VS build tools or Mono #70281
    Backlog
  • "Cannot navigate to the symbol" message box after successfully opening definition #70323
  • IDE0241 (Unnecessary nullable directive) reported inside unreachable #if block + not reported in others #70210
    Backlog
  • IIncrementalGenerator. Can't use generated properties - no errors in IDE, but build is not possible. #67273
    17.9
  • Inlinehints options could be simplified. #67075
  • c# IntelliSense override method has wrong signature. #69880
    17.9
  • Missing space character in auto completed new statement for a C# array #66027
    17.9
  • Format Document (^K^D) deletes needed line continuation underscores in VB.NET #69696
    17.8 P3
  • Visual Studio adds second quotation mark in unappropriate situations #59427
    Backlog
  • Cleanup DiffViewer code once editor provides an interactive diff viewer control #70165
  • Will IDE0305 not support Prepend? #70035
    Backlog
  • Peek Implementation for interfaces #63074
    Backlog
  • Add integration tests for Tools → Options #69929
  • Can't run "Declare Public Members" codefix provider for newly added Syntax types. #66414
    Backlog
  • Rank AsyncCompletionSessionDataSnapshot.Defaults over IntelliCode starred suggestions #65982
    Backlog
  • "Replace property with method" shouldn't convert expression body to block body #66113
  • IDE0055 for indented comment #66478

Updated

  • ProjectChanges.GetChangedDocuments(true) returns unchanged document #30674
    Backlog
  • CodeLens does not invalidate for changes in downstream projects #49775
    Backlog
  • CodeLens tests in Roslyn do not exercise OOP code paths (remote CodeLens service) #47750
    Backlog
  • CodeLens doesn't show all other references when unmapped lines exist #47606
    Backlog
  • CodeLensCallbackListener.GetDocumentIdAndNodeAsync may throw ArgumentOutOfRangeException #44639
    Backlog
  • CodeLens does not appear on conversion operators #30210
    Backlog
  • Event handler references should be counted correctly for derived WPF controls #24146
    Backlog
  • Request: CodeLens to break down setter/getter references of properties #22542
    Backlog
  • CodeLens includes other parts of partial types as references #21063
    Backlog
  • CodeLens count is inconsistent across partial declarations and linked file #13530
    Backlog
  • Codelens fails to populate reference count in a just added VB multiproject solution #6014
    Backlog
  • CodeLens shows 0 references in SharedProject without head projects #3596
    Backlog
  • Code Lens doesn't show references on Source Generated files #74104
  • Method defining line move when adding code before method declaration #73799
    Backlog
  • CodeLens: References to local functions are not displayed #73663
  • Intellisense References not showing correctly when using a Primary-Constructor #73469
    17.12
  • Cloning `DocumentId` results in impossibility to get the valid result of `GetSourceGeneratedDocumentAsync` #71581
  • Search for instances of Primary Constructor usage #70436
    Backlog
  • Codelens wrongly count multiple file-local types up from multiple files whose names are same #64592
    Backlog
  • Code lens don't work for source-generated files #64348
  • CodeLens Refresh link does not work when changes are made in a different project #60284
    Backlog
  • De-duplicate loc strings across Roslyn #56585
    17.6 P2
  • The Quick info (Codelens) xml comment only open external URL other URI not #54050
    Backlog
  • Only show/count inteface references for public references in CodeLens #53559
    Backlog
  • Find References should identify 'new()' generic constraint as a use of parameterless constructor #47633
    Backlog
  • Code lens is placed on wrong line #46352
    Backlog
  • CodeLens report 0 references for attributes not using constructor #46089
    Backlog
  • Include implicitly called methods (e.g. an overloaded "ToString()") in the CodeLens reference count #45631
    Backlog
  • Make ReferenceCodeLensProvider an IServiceBroker service and host it in OOP #43669
    17.9
  • More consistent naming of Roslyn related OOP services #42582
    Backlog
  • CodeLens reference counter should NOT include references from /// comments for XML Documentation #40427
    Backlog
  • Make CodeLens show reference count for Events #39790
    Backlog
  • CodeLens References not shown #39615
    Backlog
  • Show unused non-private type members when solution-wide analysis is off #34981
    Backlog
  • CodeLens reference count is not shown for const fields #32320
    Backlog
  • Developer mode design document #29123
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio CodeLens on fields (does NOT apply to VS Code) #23908
    Backlog
  • Properties with inaccesible access methods shouldn't be visible #71363
    Backlog
  • Show return types in completion #26489
    Backlog
  • C# EditorConfig Option for Dictionary Initializer Type #25807
    Backlog
  • VS2017express C#, tabs replaced with spaces #24031
    Backlog
  • Missing an option between "Prefer var for built-in types" and "when variable type is apparent" #23714
    Backlog
  • [request] Ability to sort CompletionItem by type inheritance #16685
    Backlog
  • Feature request: Allow me to specify a desired max-column that code should be wrapped against. #15406
    Backlog
  • There should be a spacing option for formatting tuple syntax #10587
    Backlog
  • Add an option to apply code formatting to collection initializers #8269
    17.6 P3
  • Find All in Visual studio based on Syntax tree #6618
    Backlog
  • Cannot untick "Show C# and Visual Basic References" #36378
    Backlog
  • Make call hierarchy more compact #35195
    Backlog
  • Make it possible to decide style rules based on context #34129
    Backlog
  • Completion should preselect IEnumerable properties in foreach #33427
    Backlog
  • Quick fix for ! nullable operator #33360
    Backlog
  • [Feature] Distribute code snippets with nuget package #33146
    Backlog
  • Allow .editorconfig naming differentiation for [ThreadStatic]s #32955
    Backlog
  • Large squiggles for unused expression values #32720
    Backlog
  • Warning/errors/messages are not correctly grouped for multi-targeting projects #32055
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Change return type based on return expression #31969
    Backlog
  • Treat acronyms/initialisms as words in naming conventions #31908
    Backlog
  • Design a formatter extension API #31691
    Backlog
  • Intellisense Return Value Documentation #31618
    Backlog
  • SQL inside c# strings syntax highlighting, formatting, code completion and code analysis #31028
    Backlog
  • Need to allow "unsuppress" of formatting in certain cases #30881
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Indicate recursion #30732
    Backlog
  • Export VirtualChar subsystem (+ language service extensions) to allow 3rd parties to plugin embedded languages #30590
    Backlog
  • prefer var not working as expected #29657
    Backlog
  • 'Prefer braces' feature shoudl be called 'Require braces' #29621
    Backlog
  • Design concerns around work being done with IDE Analzyers/Fxers/Refactorings #29345
    Backlog
  • "When the variable type is apparent" should be smarter about apparent types (i.e. on the same line) #28508
    Backlog
  • Toggling Show advanced build configurations should update project's configuration #28267
    Backlog
  • csharp_space_around_declaration_statements setting has ambiguous options #28022
    Backlog
  • "When variable type is apparent" doesn't apply to array initialization #26531
    Backlog
  • Extract internal class to an internal interface #38637
    Backlog
  • Format Method definition and calls #38630
    Backlog
  • Codestyle: disallow same variable name with different casing #38531
    Backlog
  • Add an option for c# override generation (ignoring expression bodied members) #38514
    Backlog
  • Suggest import statement based on common usage #38453
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup during formatting: Remove unnecessary usings - Give option not to remove system namspace #38383
    Backlog
  • Quick Info representation for flow analysis annotations #38358
    Backlog
  • Move all types without a file to matching files #38269
    Backlog
  • IDE0055 fights against vertical alignment #38241
    Backlog
  • Feature request: refactoring for adding a using / simplifying a name #38095
    Backlog
  • IDE refactoring for cascading ifs? #38083
    Backlog
  • Alignment Refactoring ordering should be stable #37962
    Backlog
  • Text Editor (C#) More Refined Code Block Preferences #37833
    Backlog
  • 'Add missing cases' for type hierarchy #37710
    Backlog
  • Refactoring to generate ArgumentOutOfRange checks on numeric types #37653
    Backlog
  • Completion should offer code style elements in documentation comments #37505
    Backlog
  • Ctrl+. -> generate field puts generated field inside #region IDisposable Support #37401
    Backlog
  • Generate single-line argument checks or allow customization #37306
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio should not report IDE0008 for static properties when csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent is enabled #37267
    Backlog
  • Add a refactoring that lets me turn a property in a field #37265
    Backlog
  • Completion suggests items that will never work at generic constraint site #37198
    Backlog
  • C#: Error check/scan/rename inactive #if blocks #37171
    Backlog
  • Quick info says calling an oblivious method is non-null #36983
  • Enable ExtractMethod for code that returns #36915
    Backlog
  • Pull members up to base type breaks existing usages if the method is private #36786
    Backlog
  • Prefer braces should have another option for not prefering braces iff on one line #41547
    Backlog
  • Option to navigate from an EditorConfig violation in error list to EditorConfig entry that caused violation #41177
    Backlog
  • Suggest exceptions to catch with try-catch block #41015
    Backlog
  • Simplifier actively avoids simplifying ambiguous/incorrect code. #40974
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct Lifetime #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in ProjectSystemProjectFactory.ConvertMetadataReferencesToProjectReferences_NoLock #75646
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix 'use conditional expression' in top level statements #75645
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix crash when 'add await' analyzers binding expressions #75644
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Shorten names shown in 'pull member up' #75643
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix inaccessible protected constructors being shown in sig help #75642
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in TextDocumentStates.AddRange #75640
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Don't show C# on-the-fly-doc for namespace symbols #75637
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix NullReferenceException in AbstractUseConditionalExpressionForAssignmentCodeFixProvider #71420
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider.ComputeDifference #75639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
